Title: Unrequited
Plot: When a U.S. military general is inexplicably murdered in the back of his limousine, a paramilitary group is suspected. They believe it was a soldier who they liberated from a Vietnam POW camp and is plotting to kill certain corrupt military figures.
GuestStars: Larry Musser, Lesley Ewen, Ryan Michael, Allan Franz, Jennifer Jasey, Mark Holden, Don McWilliams, Peter LaCroix, Scott Hylands, William Taylor, William Nunn
